Anhua county in Yiyang 益陽|益阳[Yi4 yang2], Hunan

sentences.english: Interest has been generally reduced in Anhua, and there have been reductions in other counties, too.
sentences.chinese: 安化已普遍地减了息，他县亦有减息的事。

sentences.english: Since then, the business of Anhua dark tea continued in the Northwest for hundreds of years.
sentences.chinese: 此后，安化黑茶主销西北茶市数百年。

sentences.english: Anhua dark tea has a rich culture background in the long tea history.
sentences.chinese: 安化黑茶文化底蕴深厚，千年茶史可圈可点。
